name: Television
description:
Client is a 50 year old male living in a 2 room rental flat. He has major depression and is faced with financial challenges as he is medically unfit for work. He hopes to purchase a television but have financial difficulty in affording it. 

He hopes that with some entertainment at home, he may keep himself engaged on days when negative emotions become overwhelming, thus allowing some rest from negative and difficult thoughts.

name: Washing machine
description: A family with a teenage child needs a washing machine as their existing one has broken down. It is challenging for the family to save up for a new washing machine. The family would like support from the donor to cover transport. Thank you.

name: Mircowave
description: Client is a middle aged lady who does not have enough money to buy a microwave at home for her food as she is not working currently due to chronic health issues. She is currently on financial assistance, but it is only enough to cover her basic needs and not replace her microwave. It would be very helpful if a donor could donate a new or preloved microwave in good working condition so that she can cook her food to meet her own basic needs. Thank you for helping client!

name: Television
description: Client has recently been released from prison. She is trying to created healthy routines for herself and her children. Family's old television has spoilt, and client would like to request for another television so that she can keep up with the news, as well as provide some entertainment for children since they are staying home more often due to the pandemic. Your assistance is appreciated!

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: Washing Machine
description: Family of 6 (with 4 young children) is unable to replace washing machine that has broken down unexpectedly. Parents' employment have been impacted by the heightened alert measures. Parents are now hand-washing clothes while caring for 4 young children (2 are under 2 years old). Having a working washing machine will allow parents to better attend to their children's needs.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Pek Yan Zhan

name: 40L Oven
description:
THK Pan-Disability Centre is a Sheltered Workshop for adults with special need. They are trained with basic duties such as housekeeping and baking, in hopes that they are able to attain jobs in the open job market. 
To support our clients in the baking track, we will require 3×40L Oven that have been lightly use. 
Please let us know your preferred methods of collection/delivery. Thank you.

name: Television
description: Client is a 75 year old elderly, living in a 3 room HDB flat. Client’s husband has passed away and client has been living alone ever since. Client is seeking for a television to occupy her time and feel less isolated at home. For further liaison, do contact Nurul via whatsapp at 98598767 from Monday – Friday 9am – 5pm. Thank you.

name: Gas Stove
description: Client is living with her husband and 3 children, and have another child on the way. The family are struggling financially and have unstable employment. They have recently moved into a new rental flat, and require refurbishment assistance. The gas stove should be able to link up with the main gas supply provided.

description: An elderly man has intellectual disability and is taken care by caregiver, caregiver finds difficulties to manage him,  with the recent breakdown of the TV caregiver is at the loss on how to keep him engaged, they wish to have a secondhand functional TV to help to better manage him.

name: Cooking Stove
description: A family of 5 has recently got their rental flat and required a cooking stove to cook food. Client has just lost her job and does not have extra financial to purchase a cooking stove.

name: CCTVs
description: Needy household requesting for 4 CCTVs (E.g. XiaoMi Home security camera 360)to monitor the safety and movements of two 80 plus years old elderly staying in the flat. Please include delivery fees as they will not be able to pay for it. Thank you so much.

name: Oven
description: Client is certificated medically unfit for work whereas his wife is currently unemployed. They are surviving on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office (SSO)@Sembawang. They are in need of an oven, wardrobe, standing fan and an android handphone as they do not have the resources or financial ability to purchase and get the items replaced.

name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
description: Single mother of 6 children requires vacuum cleaner to help ease her cleaning at home.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok

name: Small Fridge/Freezer
description: Client is a single unwed mother who is presently 7mo+ pregnant. Client will require support in obtaining a small fridge/freezer to store breast milk

name: Washing machine
description:
Client is requesting for a washing machine due to her current mobility issues. She used to be able to cope with her daily household chores and washes her clothes by hand. After a long stay in the hospital, her physical condition has deteriorated affecting her ability to cope with her daily activities of livings. 
Please consider to cover the installation costs of the washing machine and water pipe as well. Thank you.

name: Electric oven
description: We are requesting for a client who would need an oven as she is learning to bake on her free time, and hopes to eventually set up her own homebased business in the long term. She suffers from a genetic heart condition and is currently waiting to get a job as she was recently deemed fit for work. SSO has been supporting her financially in the meantime.

name: CCTV
description: Family consisting a single mother and her step-daughter living in a rental unit. Mother is currently unemployed due to a chronic health condition. Family experienced recent harassment and having a CCTV would help in monitoring the movements outside their home and increase their sense of safety.

name: Television
description: Family of 2 (client and grandmother) just moved into their new rental flat. Their current television has lines on the screen and will be good if they can receive a new one in case the current one breaks down.

contact.name: Louise Quek

name: Washing Machine
description: Single mother caring for two school-going children. Mother is unfit for work due to health issues. Their current washing machine has spoilt and they have to resort to handwash all their clothes. Family hopes to get a functional washing machine.(Omai)

name: Top Load Washing Machine
description: Two homeless elderly uncles are moving into their new rental flat soon and they are not able to afford furniture and electrical appliances for their rental flat as they are not working. They are currently staying in our homeless shelter. They will need a top load washing machine to wash their clothing at home.

name: Portable AirCon
description: Family has 2 children with skin disorders (eczema and allergies), their doctor advised getting an aircon to improve their skin condition and reduce discomfort. Please consider covering the cost of delivery as the family cannot afford it. You may contact me at 69784094. (Please note that it is different to an air cooler).

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Rachel Ong

name: Washing machine
description:
Single mother with 3 children requires a washing machine with a 13amp plug (normal 3-pin, not the rounded plug). Their old one has spoilt and they cannot afford to go laundromat daily to wash their clothes. 

They were previously given another washing machine but it comes with the 15amp pin (round ones) and they do not have the 15amp socket installed in the house, and cannot afford to install a new socket. As such, will need another washing machine suitable for the house.

name: Washing Machine
description: The family of four (parents with two school-going children) are facing financial difficulties. Their washing machine is spoilt but do not have sufficient funds to get another, thus requesting for donations.
specifications: 56 x 58 x 60 (Width x Depth x Height in cm)

name: Television
description: My client is single, aged 60 and is currently residing in a 1 room rental unit. Due to mental health condition, he is unable to stabilise his employment, and thus, he is currently doing ad-hoc job as a cleaner. Client requests for a working tv as his current tv is not functioning.

name: Freezer
description:
Freezer
Client is from a low-income family. recently husband's, who is sole breadwinner, his employment situation has not been very stable. She is looking for a freezer to store her fresh foods in however is unable to afford a new one. It would be helpful if they are able to receive one! Thank you :)

contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: TV
description: Homeless man moving into his rental room requires TV for his entertainment.

description: Mother requested for an air cooler to help lower home temperature as son has recently been having eczema and the hot weather causes him to develop rashes which causes son discomfort and pain.

contact.name: Naazilah Hidayatullah

name: Wheelchair
description: Client's father recently was admitted to ICU for infection. Undergone a surgery which has affected his ADL. He is not able to transfer unassisted. Requires wheelchair for mobility needs. Father is 178cm/76kg.

name: Bed Rail
description: Client is almost fully bed-bound but risks falling off the bed when he moves while asleep or tries to sit up to eat. Wife constantly wakes up at night whenever client moves, to ensure that he does not fall off.

contact.org: Fei Yue Community Services - Mental Health
contact.name: Clarissa Liew

name: Mountain Bicycle
description: The client is a person with mental health concerns, he needs to engage on activity to reduce stress and anxiety. This is one of the way he could release trapped condition. Seeking a kind donor to support the client.

name: 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter
description: Elderly grandmother has multiple health issues and is unfit for work. She requires a 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter to get around and is hoping to get a secondhand one in good condition.

name: 4 wheeled Mobility Scooter
description:
Client is a 51yo man who has Parkinson's Disease and recently suffered a stroke. As a result of his medical illnesses, wife is currently the solebreadwinner for the family of 7 (3 children and 2 elderly parents). 
In a bid to alleviate some of wife's burden, client is currently looking for jobs and if successful, would require a 4-wheel mobility scooter to travel to work.

name: Wheelchair
description:
Client is a single mother of a teenager son. 
The mother and son resides in a 2 room HDB flat, and the single parent is unemployed due to complicating health issues. 
Being unemployed, client does not have additional savings and solely relies on kind donations (e.g., food rations) and SSO financial assistance for day to day necessities.
Due to her health condition, she is unable to walk and relies on a wheelchair to move around. As the current one has been worn out, she has kindly requested for a preloved item to replace the one that she has. 
Client has also requested for a bed frame and mattress as the current one that she has is dented (in the middle) and she does not have any means to purchase such a costly item. She is willing to receive any preloved item that are in a good and functional condition.
specifications: Kindly give us 2-3 weeks time frame

name: Motorised Scooter
description:
Client is a cancer patient and staying alone. Client has some mobility issues. Thus, having a motorised scooter will allow client to go about his daily activities.

Note: Client can only use a motorised scooter that is able to support 100-150kg   in weight.

name: electric wheelchair
description:
client is requesting for an electric wheelchair due to mobility issues.
 

He recently developed a condition where all his bones are fusing together starting with his legs, and requires a wheelchair to get around. As he is losing mobility in his hands as well, an electric wheelchair would be more appropriate.

name: Motorized Wheelchair Needed for Elderly Client!
description: Client is an elderly woman with limited mobility. She is presently residing alone and is dependent on others when she utilizes her manual wheelchair. The motorized wheelchair will help her to regain her personal independence and enable her to fulfil her day-to-day needs and errands with more ease.

name: Mobility Scooter
description:
Client, 49F, works as a Grabfood deliverer. She is a divorcee and has two children living with her, aged 20M and 16F. She has been using a second-hand mobility scooter with faulty brakes, which has posed as a physical safety concern for her. She suffers from eroded knee joint cartilage on both knees which had been impacted from having to use her legs to control the speed when slowing down. She is also diagnosed with asthma/chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and is on regular inhalers. She gets short of breath when she walks long distances and hence, is heavily reliant on her mobility scooter. 

Client is looking for a replacement mobility scooter that has working brakes. She is open to having a second-hand one as well.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Toa Payoh
contact.name: Merissa Boh

name: Motorize wheelchair
description: Client is an elderly man with diabetes. Due to water retention he is not able to walk very well. His elderly wife is unable to push him on a wheelchair, and he has a frozen shoulder, making it difficult to wheel himself. As such, he would like to request for a motorized wheelchair so he can move around more easily

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: S26 Milk Powder Stage 3
description:
Client is in her 60s and caregiver to her 80+ year old mother and 3 grandchildren (5,2,1). The children's parents are not involved in the care of the grandparents and reside at a different address. Thus, client who is unemployed struggles financially to bring up the children.

Client receives milk powder rations for 1 year old toddler but milk powder is not suitable for him and causes him to have diarrhoea. Thus, client hopes to get the suitable milk powder (S26 brand Stage 3) for her youngest grandchild.

name: 2 tins of Illuma MIlk Powder stage 3

Client's parents are elderly, mother is certified unfit for work while father has been forced by company to quit his job as he is nearing his retirement age due to the covid-19 pandemic where the company is unable to retain the staffs. Child is currently been diagnosed with autism and has been lagging behind in all developmental milestones. There are also medical reports with regards to child's sensitive digestive tract and is only able to drink Illuma milk powder to prevent constipation and diarrhoea which would rush child to hospital again and incur further medical costs. Family require a tin of milk powder to tide through this month while waiting for temporary financial assistance to be processed by end of this month.

name: Food Rations
description: Requesting halal food rations for needy families who may not have money to buy food items due to financial issues. Items needed such as - 20x Bags of Rice(5kg), 20x Bags of Rice (2.5kg), 10x Packets of Beehoon (Chilli Brand), 40x Assorted Packet of Maggi Noodles [Chicken/Curry/Vegetarian], 20 Bottles of Cooking oil (1L), 30x Packets of 3-in-1 (Milo) (3in1 sachet bags), 30x Packets of Assorted Biscuits, 40x Halal Can Food [Meat -Sardine/Chicken etc] / [Vegetarian -Corn/Mushroom etc]

name: 5kg Ikan bilis
description: We are requesting for 5kg of ikan bilis as we cook 3 meals a day for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

name: 5kg Dried Prawn
description: We are requesting for 5kg of dried prawn as we cook 3 meals a day for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. description: We are requesting for 10 bottles of 5 litres cooking oil as we cook 3 meals a day for our residents from Monday to Saturday. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. name: Bicycle
description:
Mr. A who is homeless is doing grab delivery is in needs a new and lightweight bicycle for his grab delivery service. No preferred brand. 
A functional mount bicycle, strong wheels and a back seat holder to place his grab food-bag. Please contact us for delivery details.

name: Bicycle
description: The family of four (parents with two young children) are facing financial challenges due to wife's kidney health issues and husband's lack of F&B work due to the COVID-19 restrictions. Thus, husband hopes to get a bicycle to do food delivery.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

name: TENA Pants Size L
description: Client is an elderly lady who recently had an operation for colon cancer. She is using a stoma bag but requires diapers for her urine as she is not mobile and cannot use the toilet independently.

name: 20 office Pedestals with key lock
description: We are requesting for 20 office Pedestals with key lock for our office use. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We are serving about 100 residents at our premises.

name: Laptop
description: The family is in need of a laptop for Home-based learning. No brand specific, accept both new and second-hand laptop as long as it is in good working condition. Installed with Microsoft Office (word/excel/PowerPoint) for project works. The item will be directly sent to beneficiary's home and please contact us for delivery details. Thank you!

name: Bacteria and virus disinfectant spray
description: Sunbeam Place @ Children's Society is currently in need the following items for the kids' activities: Bacteria and virus disinfectant spray; Yoga pants(size S,M,L and XL);Sports shoes for girls(size 36,37,39,40 and 42); Shoe box; Sport bra for girls(size XXL and XXXL); Vertical whiteboard with rolling stand; Locked Cabinet for storage. Please contact us for the quantities needed and the delivery details. Thank you!

name: TENA L PANTS ADULT DIAPERS
description: Client is diagnosed with Rectal Cancer and living alone. Client is financially needy and requires the use of diapers as client experiences incontinence.

name: 40 X 227g Anchor pure New Zealand unsalted block butter
description: We are requesting for 40 slabs of 227g of Anchor Pure New Zealand unsalted block butter for our house baking. This is part of the work therapy provided at The Helping Hand. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premise.

name: Washing machine (6.5kg top load)
description:
A young couple with children requires assistance to adjust after both their release from incarceration. They are in the midst of stabilizing in gainful employment. They lack financial resources to replace their faulty washing machine.
Donation of the washing machine will help them in reducing their household chore load.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: Laptop (2nd hand)
description: Client is a 64yo single seeking employment. Strained relationship with family members. currently requires a laptop to navigate job portals and government websites as well as for writing resumes.

name: Laptop (2nd hand)
description: Client is a 64yo single seeking employment. Strained relationship with family members. currently requires a laptop to navigate job portals and government websites as well as for writing resumes.

name: Halal fresh/frozen food assistance for 3 to 6 months
description: A sole breadwinner with 9 children, has been experiencing there is still insufficient food supply (halal fresh/frozen food) due to the large family. Interested donor, please contact worker at shiyan@frcsfsc.sg or 8554-8219. Thank you very much!

name: Ensure milk
description: A client with a physical disability needs a carton of Ensure milk powder for daily feed in a month.

name: Stage 1 Milk Formula
description: Please contact Social Worker Jimmy at jimmygoh@thkmc.org.sg or 8718 8444 to liaise. Family living in public rental housing and facing financial crisis is seeking support for Stage 1 milk-formula for their newborn expected to be delivered in early to mid-July 2021.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

name: Adult diapers(Tena) pull up L Size (6 packets)
description:
Client (53/F) is a divorcee who lives at a HDB 1 room rental flat. Client is unemployed due to her multiple medical conditions(slip disc, hearing impairment, hepatitis C, chronic migraines, asthma) that require ongoing treatment.  Client also has Crohn's disease that affect client's bowel movement. Client is required to be on adult diapers and lady pads. Client would appreciate the donation of adult diapers and lady pads to aid her in her daily activities.


To note: Email/WhatsApp message @ 66901010, & donor will be shortlisted. Thank you.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Joycelyn Wong

name: Wall-Mounted Kitchen Cabinet or Shelf
description: Family of 6 is living in a rental flat with 4 school-going children, and experiences challenges related to finances, system barrier, and living condition. Current kitchen shelf is not in usable condition. The mother has a small home-based cooking business and a kitchen cabinet or shelf will be useful in organising her kitchen space. Anyone who is keen to donate to this family can reach me directly for more details. Thank you!

name: Cupboard with 4 rectangle drawers for folded clothes
description: Family of 9, with 7 children below 10 YO, requires a cupboard with drawers to place the children’s folded clothes. The client's spouse is not able to work due to medical issues, causing the family to lose a substantial amount of income. Family now depends on client's income as the sole breadwinner. The donation will greatly reduce the financial stress on the couple. Item to be delivered directly to client’s house.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Janetta Tan

name: make up table
description: Senior, staying alone. unable to work due to age and health. Volunteers recently help her clear and clean her flat. She requested for a make up table with mirror. Donors requested to cover the cost of transport. Thank you. CS

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Christopher Sng

name: Cabinet
description: Client is an elderly women who stay alone. Her kitchen cabinet has spoiled and needs to replace to keep cutlery.

name: KITCHEN CABINET
description: We are appealing for a KITCHEN CANINET for a single mother who is unemployed due to care giving issues and on financial assistance  she needs this item so she put a induction on top of it to cook for her child WE SEEK FURTHER ASSISTANCE FROM THE DONOR ASSIST IN THE TRANSPORTATION OR COVER THE TRANSPORTATION COST

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Maggie Gan

name: Adult Absorbent Protector
description: Elderly man with bladder control issues requires urine absorbent pads while he recovers from a recent accident.

name: Sebamed Liquid Face & Body Wash for sensitive skin
description: Client is requesting for Sebamed Liquid Face & Body Wash for sensitive skin. It is meant for her granddaughter whom she is caring for. They are living in a rental flat and has financial support but is not able to purchase the retail item for the granddaughter's need due to sensitive skin condition.

name: QuickVue At-Home OTC COVID-19 Test (25 Tests/Kit)
description:
In line with the present COVID-19 situation, our organisation, The Helping Hand has added layer of ringfencing to help to identify cases and prevent further transmission, we have started conducting mandatory Covid-19 testing to all residents and staff since 15th July 2021.
The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. 
We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premise. We are using the QuickVue At-Home OTC COVID-19 Test (25 Tests/Kit).

Here is the link for the requested item, thank you for your kindness.

https://www.guardian.com.sg/quickvue-at-home-otc-covid-19-test-25-tests-kit/p/619909

name: Size XL Diapers (Tape)
description: Client is a cancer patient on palliative care. She has been bed-ridden for the past few months and requires full-time caregiving. Her husband is the primary caregiver, and he had given up his full-time job to care for the client. The couple depends on social assistance and are frugal in their spending. The client requires diapers and this incur additional expenses for the family. The couple has a son who is in Primary 5.

name: Pressure Relief Mattress
description:
Patient is a 39 years old female who is bed-bound and uncommunicative since 2018. She is married with a four-year old son. Patient’s husband is unemployed as he is the full-time caregiver for her. Patient requires a pressure relief mattress to prevent pressure sores. Patient’s current pressure relief mattress is stained with urine and it would be challenging to clean it as patient is always lying on it. The family has difficulty affording a new pressure relief mattress due to husband’s unemployment.

The item can be found here: https://www.medicalsupplies.com.sg/pressure-relief/1873-air-mattress-yh-med-45-cell-pad-mattress-w-pump-per-unit (Pharmex). This is the model similar to patient’s current pressure relief mattress model.

Kindly arrange the donated item to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can Whatsapp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

name: TENA Super XL Pants
description:
Patient is a 42 years old male who is single and living with his elderly mother in a two-room HDB rental flat. His mother is his main caregiver. He requires assistance with his daily activities and is totally dependent. The family does not have any income and is reliant on various assistances for daily subsistence. Thus, the family has difficulty affording the ongoing consumables for patient.

Patient uses TENA Super XL Pants. The item can be found here: https://www.watsons.com.sg/pants-super-adult-diapers-xl-12s/p/BP_57783 (Watsons) or https://www.guardian.com.sg/tena-pants-super-xl-12pcs/p/171935 (Guardian).

Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can WhatsApp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

name: Tena Pull up diapers (L size) - 3 packs
description: Pt is known to SCS home hospice service and would benefit from assistance for diapers.

name: Printer
description:
Printer needed 

Family has 6 school-going children who requires a working printer to help with their school work and print necessary documents. Their current printer is faulty. Family has only one sole breadwinner, 4 of the children have special needs.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Grace Lim

name: Printer
description: Client needed a printer to print school required documents and assessment documents for her young school going children.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Zuriel Ong

name: Wireless Trackball Mouse
description:
A client with a progressive neurodegenerative illness affecting his motor function would benefit from using a wireless Trackball mouse to help him navigate and use the computer or surf Internet.

Appreciate if the donor can help get him a wireless Trackball mouse from: https://www.amazon.sg/Kensington-Expert-Trackball-Mouse-K64325/dp/B01936N73I/ref=asc_df_B00009KH63/?tag=sgsmrtphshopg-22&linkCode=df0&hvadid=389055216156&hvpos=&hvnetw=g&hvrand=12764644402438411320&hvpone=&hvptwo=&hvqmt=&hvdev=m&hvdvcmdl=&hvlocint=&hvlocphy=9062522&hvtargid=pla-338189048586&psc=1&th=1

contact.org: Fei Yue Cluster Support (CCK/ Bukit Panjang)
contact.name: Ariel Tan

name: Desktop CPU / Laptop
description: Client and husband are new parents to a 6-month old. Husband is the sole breadwinner, as client has mental health issues since young, and currently having post-natal depression as well. Client is keen to support her husband, and intends to start a home-based business. However, she requires a CPU or laptop to continue with her plans. (Kamie)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: PlayStation 4 with games
description: Client is the sole breadwinner of the family. She works as a security guard but it is an unstable job. The family is staying in a HDB rental unit and they are heavily relying on the financial assistance from the Social Service Office, hence, they are unable to provide much entertainment options to their son in view of the lack of extra financial resources. They are hoping to get a donation of a PS4 and also an electric piano so that their 11-year-old son can have some fun while at home.

name: Bicycle
description: Mother of 4 children is requesting for a bicycle which she will use to fetch her kid to and from childcare. The family of 6 lives in a 2-room rental flat; a very motivated family. Thank you very much.

name: Cooker Hob (Gas)
description: Cooker hob (gas) is needed for a family of 5. Couple (aged 67 and 65) is medically unwell and both are not working. Couple has 3 adult children and they are diagnosed with intellectual disability. 2nd child is the sole breadwinner. The current cooker hob is spoilt and they do need a replacement one. Due to financial constraints, family is unable to purchase and hopes to receive this donation. *(Please email me or call me at 81938897. Thank you)

contact.org: The SBL Vision Family Service Centre
contact.name: Cynthia Teow

name: Dishwashing Liquid and Laundry Powder Supplies
description: Family consisting a single mother and her step-daughter living in a rental unit. Mother is unable to sustain employment due to a chronic health condition. Mother is requesting for the giving of household supplies like dishwashing liquid and laundry powder, so that she can continue to ensure cleanliness and hygiene for her family, despite the financial constraints.
